title: Serif Typeface ID from magazine scan
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516114248im_/http:/typophile.com/files/details_3793.gif)

I believe I got this from the magazine "Details" but I forgot. I cut a piece of the magazine before I recycled it and forgot the name.

Anyone knows?
